author: Posted At Pm On February
title: Ex-AG Eric Holder declares somebody totally ‘VINDICATED’ after Ninth Circuit Court’s ruling – twitchy.com
text:
Ex-AG Eric Holder declares somebody totally ‘VINDICATED’ after Ninth Circuit Court’s ruling Posted at 8:51 pm on February 9, 2017 by Doug P. 
Hillary Clinton, tweeting from a secure non-White House location, has already trolled Donald Trump over the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals 3-0 ruling. Now it’s former Attorney General Eric Holder’s turn: Skill, judgment, courgage. VINDICATED. 3-0 pic.twitter.com/5A2uPTXRps 
— Eric Holder (@EricHolder) February 10, 2017 Trending WHOA: Netflix series 'Dear White People' writer tweeted something SORTA racist the night Hillary lost 
“Courgage”? We’ll give Yates supporter Holder a break because he was probably fairly excited about the ruling. I would say that Holder should know better than to say this is vindication, but given his record before SCOTUS…. https://t.co/tUPtMMOiKg 
— Chase D. Troutner (@Captain_Strongo) February 10, 2017 Radical thinks three radicals vindicate position. And you were in charge of justice, you say? https://t.co/aICQ1jLhJk
